Resorts In Gokarna: Our Favourite Places To Check Into For A Beach Holiday

By Sreepathy
96293 Interested |
63K  Views
Photo source: Kahani Paradise

Gokarna is that idyllic beach town in Karnataka that offers the best when it comes to beaches, views, and vibes. You'll love that the beaches in Gokarna are not overcrowded and there are plenty of beaches that are hidden away. Plus, the beach town has plenty of history too. We often head here for some sun and sand, and when it comes to staying in Gokarna the options are limited but just enough. We've picked up some of the best resorts in Gokarna that will ensure your stay here is just as good as the beaches. 

Overview

 
  1. 1. Kudle Beach View Resort And Spa
  2. 2. Om Beach Resort - Jungle Lodges
  3. 3. CGH Earth - SwaSwara
  4. 4. Kudle Ocean Front
  5. 5. Kahani Paradise
  6. 6. Stone Wood Nature Resort
  7. 7. Red Earth
  8. 8. Arthigamya Spa & Resort
  9. 9. Atlantis Beach Resorts
  10. 10. Blue Ocean Sands

Here's A List Of Resorts In Gokarna

Kudle Beach View Resort And Spa

Photo courtesy: Kudle Beach View Resort And Spa
Photo courtesy: Kudle Beach View Resort And Spa
Photo courtesy: Kudle Beach View Resort And Spa

Kudle Beach View Resort & Spa, Gokarna

See On Map
BOOK HERE

This charming resort and spa is a great option for a slice of luxury but with the beachside rustic atmosphere retained. We love that the cottages and rooms (beach or garden view) are quite far apart, so youre assured privacy. Plus, it is a great opportunity to soak in the seaside air. Diving, jet skiing and even the entertaining banana boat rides are on offer at this one. 

Price: INR 5,500 upwards per night 

Rating: 4.3 on Google

Om Beach Resort - Jungle Lodges

Photo source: Jungle Lodges And Resort
Photo source: Jungle Lodges And Resort
Photo source: Jungle Lodges And Resort

Om Beach Resort, Gokarna

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Weve already shared our love for this cutesy place here and were still fans! From just lurking around in the gardens with a book or beer to traipsing down to the beachside for some water fun, this ones absolute bang for the buck. There are 12 tiled cottages in total, though some are newer than others, so pick wisely. What wins this place's brownie points from us is the Ayurveda spa which has great service but wont burn a hole in your pocket. 

Price: INR 4,000 upwards per night 

Rating: 4.2 on Google

CGH Earth - SwaSwara

Photo courtesy: CGH Earth - SwaSwara
Photo courtesy: CGH Earth - SwaSwara
Photo courtesy: CGH Earth - SwaSwara

CGH Earth - SwaSwara, Gokarna

See On Map
Call (+919744070099)

SwaSwara is a fabulous option if you are looking to splurge. Ideal for the soul-searching and yoga-focused traveller, the entire concept here is wellness, from the food (made following Yoga, Naturopathy, and Ayurveda principles) to the wonderful yoga shalas. We fell for the art studio where you can indulge in pottery or painting to let out stress, you see. Quite a retreat, the Konkan cottages too blend tradition and luxury. Think brick walls, outdoor showers, and yoga decks. We believe that this is where we might find Nirvana, completely possible in the swimming pool.

Price: INR 20,000 upwards per night

Rating: 4.2 on Google

Kudle Ocean Front

Photo courtesy: Kudle Ocean Front Resort
Photo courtesy: Kudle Ocean Front Resort
Photo courtesy: Kudle Ocean Front Resort

Kudle Ocean Front Resort, Gokarn

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Smack on the beach, rustic, with pool tables and plenty of fresh air, Kudle Ocean Front is just how we like it. The multiple cottages are lined up just off the coast, and with coconut trees looming overhead, were just happy to sit on the little patio of our rooms with a beer in hand. Theres also an Ayurvedic spa in-house if you want to unwind in style. Plus, hammocks dotting the open space what more do you need, eh? 

Price: INR 3,000 upwards

Rating: 4.4 on Google 

Kahani Paradise

Photo source: Kahani Paradise
Photo source: Kahani Paradise
Photo source: Kahani Paradise

Kahani Paradise, Belekan

See On Map
BOOK HERE

The luxury boutique hotel is nestled near Paradise Beach and is for those looking to really splurge and have a relaxing weekend by the beachside. There are suites and rooms available for you to check into and we love the fact that Paradise and Half Moon beaches are a hop, skip, and jump away from the property. Don't miss out on the activities organised by the hotel which includes the Gokarna town tour and sundowners. They also have a pool and cooking classes that you can sign up for. 

Price: INR 34,000 upwards per night

Rating: 4.5 on Google

Stone Wood Nature Resort

Photo courtesy: Stone Wood Nature Resort
Photo courtesy: Stone Wood Nature Resort
Photo courtesy: Stone Wood Nature Resort

Stone Wood Nature Resort, Gokarna

See On Map
BOOK HERE

This resort in Gokarna is located close to Om Beach and has cottages and suites for you to check into. Our favourites are the cottages with nature views that overlook the plantations that surround the property. The pool-front cottages come with a sit-out area and a view of the swimming pool.

Price: INR 5,800 upwards

Rating: 4.4 on Google

Red Earth

Photo courtesy: Red Earth
Photo courtesy: Red Earth
Photo courtesy: Red Earth

Red Earth, Gokarna

See On Map
Call (+918722745555)

Red Earth is perched on a cliff and the views from there are beautiful. We love that because of the scenic location, yoga at sunrise is definitely a thing as there are one too many guests who will be doing that outside. Plus, they also offer yoga and wellness packages. Because the property is located near Gokarna and Ankola, it's a great way to explore these places as well. 

Price: INR 7,000 upwards per night

Ratings: 4.1 on Google

Arthigamya Spa & Resort

Photo source: Arthigamya Spa And Resort
Photo source: Arthigamya Spa And Resort
Photo source: Arthigamya Spa And Resort

Arthigamya Spa & Resort, Gokarna

See On Map
BOOK HERE

At the resort, you will love that you can soak in all the sun, sand, and sea as it's located by Om Beach. If you are choosing to stay for more than a weekend, then we recommend indulging in their spa treatments. They also have Gokarna beach town tour as well. 

Price: INR 5,800 upwards per night 

Rating: 4.1 on Google

Atlantis Beach Resorts

Photo courtesy: Atlantis Beach Resorts
Photo courtesy: Atlantis Beach Resorts
Photo courtesy: Atlantis Beach Resorts

Atlantis Beach Resorts, Kumta

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Atlantis Beach Resorts is perfect for those family vacations because they feature plenty of family rooms, and there's also a sun terrace that you can lounge at. Plus, there are plenty of cycling and fishing trails as well. 

Price: INR 3,500 upwards per night

Rating: 4.6 on Google


Blue Ocean Sands

Photo source: Booking.com
Photo source: Booking.com
Photo source: Booking.com

Blue Ocean Sands, Kumta

See On Map
BOOK HERE

Blue Ocean Sands is ideal for a short weekend break or those long weekend holidays during the festive season. The property is located in Kumta away from the hustle and bustle. There are plenty of well-designed sea-facing rooms as well. Their dine-in restaurant offers both local cuisine as well as international fare. Apart from this, don't miss out on the activities that the hotel organises. 

Rating: 4.1 on Google

Price: INR 3,000 upwards per night
